content: {"message": "Hello, is this Samuel? This is Donna from Arionkoder. I hope you're doing well. I'm calling to complete your information on our records. Could you please provide me with your last name?", "continue_chat": true}
Sure, my last name is Heinrichs.
{"message": "Thank you, Samuel. Just to confirm, is your last name spelled as H-E-I-N-R-I-C-H-S?", "continue_chat": true}
{"message": "Great, thank you for confirming that, Samuel. We have all the information we need now. Have a wonderful day!", "continue_chat": false}
